body:
Hi, I just want to tell you my stats, when I put the link (http://avicus.net/353982) my stats are not loaded and not let me see them, that bothers me (for some reason unknown to me :D)
Yes, I'm using Google Translate , Because I speak Spanish and do not speak much English
ñeñeñeñeñe....

replies.body:
try avicus.net/strikergaymer312/stats, there currently is a glitch where new members can't view their stats D: there aren't any fancy graphs or anything... but the core details are there ;c


tratar avicus.net/strikergaymer312/stats , actualmente es un problema técnico donde los nuevos miembros no pueden ver sus estadísticas D : (utilizando el traductor de google D :)
no hay gráficos de lujo o algo ... pero los detalles básicos están ahí ; c
